entry.title: Then He Kiss'd Me
entry.summary:
Author: Alwhisker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,304Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 60

Summary: .... - "I didn’t need a glorified spandex ad to come to my aid" Wayne's tone was glowering and slightly breathless as he wiped the blood off his chin, looking over to the caped man who’d been covered in dust and rain, clark was taken aback, but remained his composure, it wasn't time to bicker with billionaires just yet. "you're welcome" he muttered, floating up to look over the crowd, he watched as the officers surrounded Bruce Wayne, EMT's checking over his wounds as the criminals were carted away into padded cars, flashing lights of cameras clicking around the scene. but clark could only focus on the man wiping his bleeding lip, effortlessly drawing him in, among the thousands of voices in his mind, only one stood out.only one."Alfred, I promise you I am fine, I- no, my leg’s fine, Grayson. Damian, stop."Clark found himself grinning, soft enough that he didn't notice it at first, but the clicks of cameras and flashing lights woke him up from his daydream, the wind under his chin was getting colder, Gotham's air was gentle on his skin, despite the smog in the air and the scent of blood that somehow always lingered, no matter how much they scrubbed down the streets.

entry.title: ShutterBug
entry.summary:
Author: Iriley

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 127,538Chapters: 53/?Kudos: 1,461

Summary: Waking up Peter finds him self in a new city and no memory of how he got there. The question is, where is Gotham and how did he get there?Little does he know that his new photographer job will lead him to making new friend and maybe something more.Join Peter as he takes on Gotham and its rouges- not to mention finding his place as a spider in the mists of bats and birds. Another Peter in Gotham fic!

entry.title: Interviewing Superman: A Bruce Wayne Exclusive
entry.summary:
Author: Samitus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,949Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 535

Summary: Bruce Wayne wore many hats: CEO by day, playboy by night, Batman when needed, and full-time father.But with Batman on an unexpected break, Bruce finds himself stepping into the role of journalist when Superman requests exclusive interviews to earn the Dark Knight’s trust. After all, who better than Bruce—allegedly Batman's 'sugar daddy'—to introduce him to Dark Knight ?With his detective instincts kicking in, Bruce sees an opportunity to uncover Superman’s weaknesses. But interviewing an alien who seems to like everyone but him turns out to be his toughest challenge yet.

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,407Chapters: 7/65Kudos: 157

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.ORThe one in which they are both trapped and enslaved by Clark's growing sexual desire and his alien physiology. entry.title: Blasphemous Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Fluffmonster69

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,390Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Inspired by the events of Batman: Gotham By Gaslight (1989) Bruce Wayne is on trial, believed to be Jack the Ripper after the serial murders follow him from London to Gotham. Clark Kent is sent to report on the trial and the week leading to Bruce's execution. He is unnerved by Bruce, who's appearance and demeanor have drastically changed, however upon arriving back in Gotham a day after the trial Clark is greeted with the city in uproar. Bruce Wayne has escaped his imprisonment and criminals start cropping up half dead covered in identical puncture wounds. Clark sets out to find Bruce as Superman, finding instead a monster lurking in the shadows of Gotham's streets.*Tags and warnings may change.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,878Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 130

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,148Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 214

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,065Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 483

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.
